content.text:
Refer to the figure <image 1>, Which term refers to the end of the story, or the very last event that takes place?

A. Resolution
B. Exposition
C. Conflict
D. Rising Action

A. Resolution

The resolution is the part of the story where the conflicts are resolved and the story comes to an end. In the context of the phrase "And they lived happily ever after," it refers to the conclusion of the story where everything is resolved and the characters live happily.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
